attributes.action: Changes To The School Admission age in Rhondda Cynon Taff to Pre-Nursery and Nursery
attributes.additional_details:
SUMMARY OF PROPOSALS TO BE CONSIDERED

Proposed Changes to Admissions for Pre-Nursery and Nursery

The proposed change would see pupils starting school the term following their 3rd birthday on a part time basis before turning full-time when they start Reception the September after their 4th birthday.

Should this go ahead, children who are currently in nursery/meithrin full-time, will be reduced to part-time hours causing distress to the children and also financial difficulty to working parents as childcare cost will have to be met - DO NOT ALLOW THIS TO HAPPEN TO OUR CHILDREN!
